biotools.summary: aCcelerated Alignment-FrEe sequence analysis. Compute overall 28 distance/dissimilarity measures including (1) conventional measures based on k-mer counts, (2) newly developed measures based on background adjusted k-mer counts, and (3) measures based on presence/absence of k-mers.
